com.github.ffalcinelli.buffalo.airstation

Class RequestAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ffalcinelli.buffalo.airstation.RequestAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RequestAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    An adapter to build AirStation requests and parameters to use in both Synchronous and Asynchronous calls.

    Created by fabio on 13/03/17.

      • doLoginFromHomeResponse

        public okhttp3.Request doLoginFromHomeResponse(java.lang.String username,
                                               java.lang.String password,
                                               okhttp3.Response homeResponse)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        After having received the home page, build the subsequent login Request.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to use while forging the request.
        password - The password to use while forging the request.
        homeResponse - The response got for a previous call to the home page.
        Returns:
        The login Request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Whenever and error occurs while parsing or encoding data.

        Parameters:

        suffix - String to append to keys (e.g. "_a" for WiFi A and "_g" for WiFi G).
